stories.text:
Does anyone know anything about ID.me? I had to do something with CA DMV and realized that now they mandate that my online DMV account shares my information with ID.me else it won't let me proceed beyond the login screen.

Also, for new accounts, including minors, it is mandating this data sharing with ID.me, including SSN, DoB and so on.

This seems like a huge risk for me. Unfortunately it seems CA DMV has gotten rid of paper forms. Local DMV said they don't have those anymore.

The only other option for me is to use the computer at the DMV, but that seems like its own risk as those are public terminals and I don't feel comfortable filling private info, such as SSN, DoB, address on a public terminal.

Any thoughts/info would help..
stories.title: Ask HN: Does anyone know about ID.me? CA DMV is forcing sharing data with it
